doc:description.doc:para: Upload the video @local_filename. The upload will be performed asynchronously and @opid can be used to identify the upload in the #VideoUpload::VideoUploadProgress signal.

doc:doc.doc:summary: The local filename of the image to upload.
Operation identifier, used in the #VideoUpload::VideoUploadProgress signal.

doc:description.doc:para: This signal is guaranteed to be emitted at least once with either @progress at 100 (i.e. upload complete) or an error state.

doc:doc.doc:summary: Operation identifier, as returned by UploadVideo().
Current progress, the normal range being 0 (not started) to 100 (completed), with -1 meaning an error occurred.
The human-readable error message. This will be set if @progress is -1.
